adhyapana amathi akila wiraj kariyawasam, wipaksha nayaka aar.sambandhan, palath aandukara rejinold kure, palath maha amathi si.wi.wigneshwaran mahathwarunge sahabhagithwayen krida ulele samarambhaka awasthawa pawathwena athara ema awasthawata ha samaptha ulelata krida amathi dayasiri jayasekara, niyojya amathi ech.em.em.haris, krida amathyanshaye lekam aacharya di.em.aar.bi. disanayaka, krida sanwardhana departhumenthuwe adhyaksha janaral es.ee.aar.ti.em.es.pi. bandara mahathwarun samagin palath krida amathiwarun da ekwimata niyamithaya.

ranil wikramasinha mahatha eksath jathika pakshaye nayakathwaya kisi witaka ath harinne naha.emenma shri lanka nidahas pakshaya sathu wasthuwak wana maithripala sirisena janadhipathiwaraya eksath jathika pakshaya wetha gena pakshikayanta awasanaye dukak saha wedanawak ithuru wu bawa ee mahatha wadiduratath pawasiya.
